resonance.client.ambiance.leavesIdleChan: The chance of hearing leaves blow with the wind (1 in x)
resonance.client.ambiance.leavesAddition: The chance of hearing additional sounds from trees (1 in x)
resonance.client.ambiance.leavesDawnAddi: The chance of hearing robins chirp in the early morning (1 in x)
resonance.client.ambiance.forestWolfChan: The chance of hearing wolves howl at night (1 in x)
resonance.client.ambiance.enableNightIdl: Play Distant Insect Chirps at Night
Sets if the distant insect chirp loop sound should be played at night
resonance.client.ambiance.enableRiverSou: Sets if the river loop sound should be played
resonance.client.ambiance.swampIdleChanc: The chance of hearing ambient swamp noises (1 in x)
resonance.client.ambiance.enableOceanSou: Sets if the ocean loop sound should be played
resonance.client.ambiance.villageAdditio: The chance of hearing ambient village noises (1 in x)
